```{r}
setup.dir <- system.file("extdata/tutorial/basic", package="zonator")
test.project <- create_zproject(setup.dir)
variant.4 <- getvariant(test.project, 4)

labels <- paste0("Laji", 1:7)


p1 <- plot(variant.4, monochrome=FALSE, group=FALSE, labels=labels,
           features=1:2,
           statistic="mean", invert.x=TRUE, main="Esimerkki")
p1  + geom_vline(xintercept = 0.9) +  
     curve.theme
```
